name: 11th Zimbabwe International Research Symposium
content: RCZ organise symposia in order to popularise research and to provide a platform for the dissemination and documentation of that research. Specifically, symposia enable researchers, industry, commerce, policy makers and users of research results in Zimbabwe and the world at large to receive new scientific knowledge for use in informed decision making and development of goods and services competitively. The world has become a global village in which collaboration in research is gaining importance, hence this platform to allow for networking and engagement among the researchers themselves. Symposia are held biennially
